</button>

    Normal Secondary
</button>

    Normal Primary
</button>

<button class="text-sm border-solid border-secondary border text-secondary rounded-sm py-1 px-3 hover:opacity-50">
    Normal Secondary
</button>

<button class="text-sm bg-disable text-white rounded-sm py-1 px-3 hover:bg-opacity-50">
    Normal Disable
</button>
